message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm offering it at a price of $13,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I had in mind. Could we meet somewhere in the middle, say at $11,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on $11,000 for the product?
